name.baseName: Municipal sludge treatment and disposal;dry sludge;thickening
市政污泥处理与处置;干污泥;浓缩

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Several typical sludge treatment facilities in China, representing anaerobic digestion, composting, co-combustion, thermal drying-incineration, and cement production, respectively, are selected to carry out the inventory. Data are mainly taken from the site-specific measurement, either by field survey or by operation report. Sludge characteristics are based on the average values of the sites investigated.
选择国内几个典型的污泥处理设施，分别为厌氧消化、堆肥、共燃、热干燥焚烧和水泥生产，进行调查。数据主要来自具体地点的测量，要么通过实地调查，要么通过操作报告。污泥特性基于所调查场地的平均值。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: One ton of sludge on a dry basis (1 t-DS) is defined as the functional unit.

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Sludge needs to be thickened and dewatered before treatment. The sludge moisture content after thickening is about 97%.
污泥在处理前需浓缩脱水。浓缩后的污泥含水率约为97%。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set describes the process of municipal sludge treatment and disposal, specifically focusing on the thickening of dry sludge. This process is applicable in municipal waste management systems where the reduction of sludge volume is necessary before further treatment or final disposal. The material, represented by this data set, is commonly used in the management of sewage systems and wastewater treatment plants.
本数据集描述的是市政污泥处理与处置的过程，重点是干污泥的浓缩。该过程适用于市政废物管理系统，在进行进一步处理或最终处置之前需要减少污泥体积。该数据集代表的材料通常用于污水系统的管理和污水处理厂。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Dong, J., Chi, Y., Tang, Y., Wang, F. & Huang, Q. Combined Life Cycle Environmental and Exergetic Assessment of Four Typical Sewage Sludge Treatment Techniques in China. Energy Fuels 28, 2114–2122 (2014).

Dong, J., Chi, Y., Tang, Y., Wang, F. & Huang, Q. Combined Life Cycle Environmental and Exergetic Assessment of Four Typical Sewage Sludge Treatment Techniques in China. Energy Fuels 28, 2114–2122 (2014).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set, ensure that it is applied within the context of municipal wastewater treatment and sludge management processes. The functional unit of one ton of dry sludge (1 t-DS) must be considered in the life cycle assessment to maintain consistency and comparability. Attention should be given to methodological considerations such as system boundaries, especially regarding the inclusion or exclusion of subsequent sludge treatment or disposal options. Users should also consider the technological applicability specific to their geographic or operational context.
使用此数据集时，请确保将其应用于市政废水处理和污泥管理过程的背景下。生命周期评估中必须考虑一吨干基污泥（1 t-DS）的功能单位，以保持结果的一致性和可比性。应注意方法论上的考虑，如系统边界，特别是关于后续污泥处理或处置选项的包括或排除。用户还应考虑特定于其地理或运营背景的技术适用性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
